channel.title: CVE Feed for themifyme -- Themify Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themifyme -- Themify Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-9385|2024-10-05T01:59:41.325Z -- themifyme -- themify%20builder
item.description: The Themify Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-7836|2024-08-22T02:02:03.277Z -- themifyme -- themify%20builder
item.description: The Themify Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized post duplication due to missing checks on the duplicate_page_ajaxify function in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to duplicate and view private or draft posts created by other users that otherwise shouldn't be accessible to them.

item.title: CVE-2024-7836|2024-08-22T14:28:06.284Z -- themifyme -- themify%20builder
item.description: The Themify Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized post duplication due to missing checks on the duplicate_page_ajaxify function in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to duplicate and view private or draft posts created by other users that otherwise shouldn't be accessible to them.
